M

m_x - Static variable in class Maze.StartMenu
X position of the mouse
m_y - Static variable in class Maze.StartMenu
Y position of the mouse
main(String[]) - Static method in class Maze.StartMenu
Sets up a StartMenu object to run as a thread.
makeGUI() - Method in class Maze.StartGame
Initializes the GamePanel object while passing in an argument that represents the dimensions of the initial maze to be generated (N by N maze).
Maze - package Maze
 
maze - Variable in class Maze.GamePanel
Contains a GenMaze object which is generated upon initialization of GamePanel or when a new level is initialized.
maze - Variable in class Maze.GraphicsMaze
GenMaze object containing the hypothetical/conceptual maze which is then converted into a graphical maze in this.
mazeDimension - Variable in class Maze.GamePanel
Maze dimension (integer) used when generating a new maze.
mouseClicked - Static variable in class Maze.StartMenu
Set to true when the mouse is clicked.
mouseClicked(MouseEvent) - Method in class Maze.StartMenu
This method is not employed, but is included as part of the MouseListener interface.
mouseDragged(MouseEvent) - Method in class Maze.StartMenu
This method is not employed, but is included as part of the MouseMotionListener interface.
mouseEntered(MouseEvent) - Method in class Maze.StartMenu
Sets the static boolean mouseOnScreen to true, upon each mouse entry into the JFrame.
mouseExited(MouseEvent) - Method in class Maze.StartMenu
Sets the static boolean mouseOnScreen to false, upon each mouse exit out of the JFrame.
mouseMoved(MouseEvent) - Method in class Maze.StartMenu
Sets the static boolean mouseOnScreen to true, upon each mouse movement in the JFrame.
mouseOnScreen - Static variable in class Maze.StartMenu
Set to true when the mouse is inside the JFrame.
mousePressed(MouseEvent) - Method in class Maze.StartMenu
Sets the static boolean mouseClicked to true, upon each mouse click.
mouseReleased(MouseEvent) - Method in class Maze.StartMenu
Sets the static boolean mouseClicked to false, upon each mouse release.
move() - Method in class Maze.Character
Performs a move operation in the corresponding direction if there are no possible collisions.
moveDown - Variable in class Maze.InputHandler
Boolean that represents downward movement which is triggered upon KeyPressed or KeyReleased of the down arrow key.
moveDown() - Method in class Maze.InputHandler
Returns a boolean that represents movement in the down direction.
moveDown() - Method in interface Maze.MoveHandler
Returns a boolean that represents movement in the down direction.
MoveHandler - Interface in Maze
MoveHandler specification that all InputHandlers (regardless of input type) must meet in order for the character object to correctly move.
moveLeft - Variable in class Maze.InputHandler
Boolean that represents horizontal movement towards the left, which is triggered upon KeyPressed or KeyReleased of the left arrow key.
moveLeft() - Method in class Maze.InputHandler
Returns a boolean that represents movement in the left direction.
moveLeft() - Method in interface Maze.MoveHandler
Returns a boolean that represents movement in the left direction.
movementSpeed - Static variable in class Maze.Character
Character object's (Rectangle) movement speed in pixels.
mover - Variable in class Maze.Character
Move handler object which character object depends on to correctly handle movements, all input handlers must meet this specification.
moveRight - Variable in class Maze.InputHandler
Boolean that represents horizontal movement towards the right, which is triggered upon KeyPressed or KeyReleased of the right arrow key.
moveRight() - Method in class Maze.InputHandler
Returns a boolean that represents movement in the right direction.
moveRight() - Method in interface Maze.MoveHandler
Returns a boolean that represents movement in the right direction.
moveUp - Variable in class Maze.InputHandler
Boolean that represents upward movement which is triggered upon KeyPressed or KeyReleased of the up arrow key.
moveUp() - Method in class Maze.InputHandler
Returns a boolean that represents movement in the up direction.
moveUp() - Method in interface Maze.MoveHandler
Returns a boolean that represents movement in the up direction.
msgsFont - Variable in class Maze.GamePanel
Font object containing parameters describing the type of font used to draw score and time to the screen.
